title: Man dies from accidental gunshot wound
content:
MOUNT VERNON — A man found with a gunshot wound in a vehicle parked in the Safeway parking lot has died.
Mount Vernon police were called to the store at about 4 p.m. Thursday afternoon when a person in the parking lot noticed the man slumped over in the vehicle, said Mount Vernon Police Lt. Chris Cammock.
The 77-year-old man was from Illinois, but was spending a few months camping in Newhalem with his wife, Cammock said.
While his wife shopped, the man apparently accidentally shot himself in the leg, Cammock said.
A gun was recovered from inside the vehicle, Cammock said.
"All indications we have right now, it appears to be a tragic accident," he said.
The man's family in Illinois have not yet been notified, Cammock said.
